name: First Eagles: The Great Air War 1914-1918
name_original: First Eagles: The Great Air War 1914-1918
description:
First Eagles: The Great Air War 1914-1918 is a simulation game developed by Third Wire Productions. It came out on 24-11-2006. G2 Games published the game.
First Eagles: The Great Air War 1914-1918 is available on PC.
